Title: Down with Li Fanwu!
Designer: Art Propaganda Corps of the Harbin Worker-Peasant-Soldier University's Red Rebel Group (哈尔滨工农兵大学红色造反团艺术宣传队)
Notes: Li Fanwu (1912-1986) served in various high-ranking CCP and government positions and was an important leader of the country's rubber industry. . He was severely persecuted during the "Cultural Revolution" and was imprisoned for a long time.See also the companion poster of this set.
